name: Roasted New Potatoes with Caramelized Onions and Truffle Oil
source_file: Roasted New Potatoes w Caramelized Onions and Truffle Oil.txt
description: Simple roasted new potatoes with caramelized onions, finished with a drizzle of white truffle oil.
ingredients: 1 lb small new potatoes, scrubbed and quartered
1 1/2 yellow onions, peeled and thinly sliced
Kosher salt and freshly ground black pepper
Several shakes of white truffle oil, about 1/2 tsp
instructions: Put onions and potatoes in a sturdy roasting pan. Pour olive oil over them and toss well to coat. Liberally sprinkle salt and pepper over potatoes and onions.
Spread potatoes out so they are in a single layer in the pan.
Place in oven. Cook for 40 minutes or until potatoes are lightly browned and cooked through.
Drizzle with white truffle oil before serving.
